message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, which is fair considering you'll lose value in future rounds due to inflation.
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but your initial offer was too low. Let's settle this fairly. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Due to 20% inflation on your side now, this 65-35 split actually gives you equivalent value to what you offered me. Let's conclude this now before further inflation reduces your value more.
Alice, let's be realistic. The inflation is working against me, but dragging this out only hurts us both. I'm proposing a 50/50 split. It's the fairest option at this point.
